definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Connect the vent hose to the axle shaft tube.
sentences.chinese: 向主动轴管上连接通风管。

sentences.english: Once the ventilator shaft became blocked, the warehouse quickly filled with fumes.
sentences.chinese: 通风管一旦堵塞，仓库很快就充满了烟雾。

sentences.english: Or, at least, to buy another roll of duct tape.
sentences.chinese: 或者，至少，可以再买一圈采暖通风管。

sentences.english: The results of an actural use of the duct in a ship are also presented.
sentences.chinese: 同时还介绍了该种通风管制品在舰艇上的实用效果。

sentences.english: Actually, this is a special form of chimney and ventilation pipe.
sentences.chinese: 其实，这是特殊形式的烟囱和通风管道。

sentences.english: Please cut those air pipes carefully and keep the top boss safely.
sentences.chinese: 切除时请小心别伤到通风管的上半截。

sentences.english: Ventilation pipe is vital part of ventilation system.
sentences.chinese: 通风管道是通风系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The Hisense air-conditioning has infinity transmitter near its draft flue.
sentences.chinese: 我家的海信空调通风管附近私藏有窃听器。

sentences.english: How many airways are there in this coal mine?
sentences.chinese: 这个煤矿有多少个通风管道？

sentences.english: He stuffed the ventilator shafts up to stop the smoke from entering his room.
sentences.chinese: 他堵住了通风管道，用以防止烟气进入他的房间。

sentences.english: Disconnect the vent hose from the axle shaft tube.
sentences.chinese: 从主动轴管上断开通风管。

sentences.english: Smoke seeped in through the vents.
